projects.title: Webex Contact Center
projects.desc: It manages customer interactions across various channels. Along with handling inbound and outbound calls, contact center agents also communicate with customers through email, messaging, chat, and social media (Facebook and Whatsapp). Plus, AI-powered virtual agents facilitate faster support whenever they need it.
work: Development of components with Svelte and Javascript & integration of Rest APIs.
Integration of SignalR APIs with modules and web components which enables to broadcast messages in real-time with multichannel (SMS, Whatsapp, Facebook, and Email).
Creation of web components with DireFlow.
For the email feature implementations, components are created with ReactJs and then converted into web components with Direflow.
Analysis and development of features reducing the dependencies on libraries and boosting web application's performance.
Prioritize security concerns while development (eg. XSS attacks, auth-related, token safety).
Automation test on components with Cypress tool and generating reports on test/code coverage.
